definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
the Elgin Marbles, the Parthenon marbles stolen in 1801-1810 by Thomas Bruce, 7th Earl of Elgin
pinyin: Ai1 er3 jin1 da4 li3 shi2

sentences.english: Tanshan Town of Yun County is abundant in marble resource.
sentences.chinese: 郧县谭山镇大理石资源丰富。

sentences.english: It's a palace with a huge marble portico.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个建有巨大的大理石柱廊的宫殿。

sentences.english: Smooth mirror reflective finish on a marble bathroom countertop enhances its looks.
sentences.chinese: 浴室大理石台面的镜面反射可以增强其视觉效果。

sentences.english: From this corridor the visitor looks through carved marble screens to a central room.
sentences.chinese: 从廊道游者可以穿过雕花大理石屏风直接看到里屋。

sentences.english: The pillars were of green marble, and the pavement of a kind of peach-blossom marble.
sentences.chinese: 绿色大理石柱子，地则用桃花颜色的大理石铺就。

sentences.english: The pillars were of green marble, and the pavement of a kind of peach-blossom marble.
sentences.chinese: 绿色大理石柱子，地则用桃花颜色的大理石铺就。

sentences.english: What is sculpture is to a block of marble, education isto the soul.
sentences.chinese: 教育之于心灵，犹如雕刻之于大理石。

sentences.english: Scagliola diaphaneity is bad, and without burnish.
sentences.chinese: 人造大理石透明度不好，而且没有光泽。

sentences.english: I saw this huge piece of marble.
sentences.chinese: 看见一块巨大的大理石。

sentences.english: We're looking for raw marble, travertine and all kind of block stones.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找原料大理石，石灰和所有类型的块石头。

sentences.english: Marble statue of Hera greets visitors at the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 一尊大理石赫拉像站立在入口出迎接着参观者。

sentences.english: LCK31 was displayed on the wall of Kuang- Long Marble Factory years ago, Hua-Lien County.
sentences.chinese: 还放在花莲县光隆大理石工厂墙上时的LCK31。

sentences.english: The master en suite, in gray veined white marble, is luxury defined.
sentences.chinese: 主卧卫生间用大面积灰色纹路的白色大理石定义奢华。

sentences.english: The floor is paved with a rare white marble known as the 'Greek Crystal'.
sentences.chinese: 地面采用举世罕见的希腊水晶白大理石。

sentences.english: There are many perpendicular marble columns in Greek temples.
sentences.chinese: 宇有很多垂直的大理石柱。

sentences.english: Rotate the marbles on the plate like this.
sentences.chinese: 在旋转的大理石板像这样。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
